Edges-Voodooist -- Female Human Seasoned Voodooist
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d12 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Obese: -1 Strength Step (worn gear)
Skills (14 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d6 Faith: (spi) d12 Psionics: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Focus: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6-2 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Been To The Crossroads: May reroll Faith
Size: 1
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Voodooist); Been To The Crossroads; Favored; Holy/Unholy Warrior Hindrances: Driven; Obese; Ugly+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Voodooist): Has Material Components+ and Miracles feature
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Miracles: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Miracles)
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Kevlar Riding Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Flare Gun (2d4 R3"); Gatling (2d8 R24" AP 2); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Voodooist): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
Favored: Reduces cost of Aspect Of The Rada Loa and Fury Of The Petra Loa to 3 PP
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add an equal amount to a Soak roll
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
